This test verifies that author shadow root's #document-fragment is displayed and user-agent one is hidden by default.

- <div id="container">
    - <div id="test1">
          #shadow-root (open)
      </div>
    - <div id="test2">
          #shadow-root (open)
          "only test"
      </div>
    - <div id="test3">
          #shadow-root (closed)
          "with "
          <span>elements</span>
      </div>
      <input type="text" value="Test">
  </div>
